meanings.sent1: The perfumed flowers filled the room with a sweet scent.
meanings.sent2: The perfumed candles created a relaxing atmosphere in the spa.
meanings.sent3: The perfumed lotion made everyone want to sniff their hands all day.
meanings.sent4: Her perfumed hair reminded him of a blooming garden.
meanings.sent5: The perfumed air in the bakery made customers crave freshly baked goods.

meanings.definition: To apply perfume to; make fragrant
meanings.sent1: She perfumed her wrists before going out for the evening.
meanings.sent2: He perfumed the room with a delicate spray of lavender.
meanings.sent3: The chef perfumed the kitchen with the aroma of spices and herbs.
meanings.sent4: The flowers perfumed the entire garden with their sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent5: The fresh laundry perfumed the house with a clean, comforting smell.
